author: Bardfinn
text:
Related: https://www.justsecurity.org/72339/qanon-is-a-nazi-cult-rebranded/

/r/pedogate was a Pizzagate / QAnon harassment operation, and QAnon is a stochastic domestic terrorist operation that seeks to weaponise fear, anxiety, and doubt - and mobilise people into harassing others.

QAnon is literally an entire chapter out of the Goebbels playbook, and Pizzagate and all the successor "powerful paedophiles are trafficking children!" witch-hunts are simply one page out of their propaganda machine.

text: That' true, because those things came before Qanon. It'd be fairer to say that Qult members became pizzagaters.

author: Chand_laBing
text: I think they were turning a phrase for the underhanded, devious tactics and propagandizing of the Nazis. For example, attacking political opponents and spreading rumors of conspiracies (Bolshevik Jews vs. elite pedophiles).

author: ShouldersofGiants100
text: Oh they are pulling straight from a slander so old that even the Nazis were drawing on old propoganda when they used it. The idea that Jews were kidnapping Gentile children for sacrifice is something that dates back to at least the 19th century—and a beat for beat restatement of it is seen with the whole "adrenochrome" conspiracy. QAnon slightly tones down "Jews" in favour of "Liberals"—but most fascists believe that liberalism and socialism were created by Jews, so that's six of one, half a dozen of the other.
